price: Y [recuerden] cuando le dijo su Señor: "Entrégame tu voluntad", respondió: "Le entrego mi voluntad al Señor del Universo".
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥٓ أَسۡلِمۡۖ قَالَ أَسۡلَمۡتُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahu rabbuhu aslim qāla aslamtu lirabbi al-ʿālamīna
